description: This file defines the NotepadController class for managing a to-do list application using the Enyo framework. It includes methods for handling task creation, deletion, editing, toggling completion status, and filtering tasks based on their state.

classes.name: ToDo.NotepadController
classes.description: Controller class managing to-do list tasks, handling user interactions and updating the UI accordingly.

methods.name: clearCompleted
methods.description: Removes all tasks marked as completed from the collection and updates the display.

methods.name: routeChanged
methods.description: Handles changes in the route and refreshes the task list display.

methods.name: leaveField
methods.description: Handles the event when a task editing field loses focus, updating or deleting the task accordingly.

methods.name: showEdit
methods.description: Enables editing mode for a task.

methods.name: saveNew
methods.description: Creates a new task with the provided value and refreshes the list.

methods.name: toggleComplete
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of a task.

methods.name: toggleAllComplete
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of all tasks.

methods.name: clearEdit
methods.description: Exits editing mode for a task.

methods.name: loadList
methods.description: Loads and filters the task list based on the current route, updating the UI accordingly.
